short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ADBlocker for Facebook, remove Reels, ads and so on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Remove Reels on Facebook allows you to unleash the full potential of Facebook as a tool for good by removing distractions, hiding unnecessary suggestions (i.e. temptations), and simplifying the interface. 

The core features of the extension include:
- 🙈 Remove Reels
- 🏥 Remove Shorts
- 🤰 Remove Suggested for You
- 📆 Remove Birthday Reminders
- 🔔 Remove Notification
- Remove Peoples You may know from friends section.

and also You can replace them with Clean Mode ( Remove replacement text and Motivational quotes like nothing happened )

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Find more extensions: This is a promotional link if you want to discover more browser extensions developed by ESUIT.
Buy me a coffee: If you'd like to support our future updates and maintenance, you can use this feature to buy us a cup of coffee.
Report a bug: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Rate Chrome Store options: If you enjoy using this extension, you can click here to rate it.

Warning
Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This is an independent project developed by ESUIT. and has no relationship to Facebook™ or Facebook Inc. 

this extension is not officially developed by Facebook™, The author is @William Chen

Got feedback or experiencing any issues? Let us know on Facebook! Your input is important to us and we're here to help.
https://www.facebook.com/esuitdev
long.en,en_AU:
Remove Reels on Facebook allows you to unleash the full potential of Facebook as a tool for good by removing distractions, hiding unnecessary suggestions (i.e. temptations), and simplifying the interface. 

The core features of the extension include:
🙈 Remove reels
😽 Allow friend's reels from feeds
🏥 Remove sponsored
🤰 Remove suggested for You
🚫 Remove Market Ads
🔎 Remove searching Ads
😵 Remove stories
😷 Remove group you might like
📆 Remove birthday reminders
🔔 Remove notification
🔞 Remove peoples You may know

and also You can replace them with Clean Mode ( Remove replacement text and Motivational quotes like nothing happened )

If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. (We only collect this data from subscribers; if you do not subscribe, we will not collect any of your data.) This is our privacy policy.
https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

Notice: this extension has In-App Purchases.
This extension includes features that require payment to unlock unlimited usage. Please refer to our pricing page for more details.
https://esuit.dev/pricing/remove-reels-for-facebook

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Function Description: A brief description accompanied by a video tutorial demonstrating how to use this extension.
Login Button: Use when you need to subscribe to premium features or log in with an existing subscription.
Relevant-Ext: We provide brief recommendations and introductions to relevant extensions in a small section.
Encountering an issue? Report it to us 💪: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Warning
Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This is an independent project developed by ESUIT. and has no relationship to Facebook™ or Facebook Inc. 

this extension is not officially developed by Facebook™, The author is @William Chen
